comments.body:
The default value could change, we should use `SQLConf.PARQUET_WRITE_LEGACY_FORMAT.default.get.toString`

Could use also fix the above two?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -65,7 +65,7 @@ private[parquet] class CatalystSchemaConverter(
   def this(conf: Configuration) = this(
     assumeBinaryIsString = conf.get(SQLConf.PARQUET_BINARY_AS_STRING.key).toBoolean,
     assumeInt96IsTimestamp = conf.get(SQLConf.PARQUET_INT96_AS_TIMESTAMP.key).toBoolean,
-    writeLegacyParquetFormat = conf.get(SQLConf.PARQUET_WRITE_LEGACY_FORMAT.key).toBoolean)
+    writeLegacyParquetFormat = conf.get(SQLConf.PARQUET_WRITE_LEGACY_FORMAT.key, "false").toBoolean)
